Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 576 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Inter Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
